description: High-impact keynote addresses, policy-focused panel discussions and expert roundtables will set the intellectual foundation of the Summit. The India AI Expo will be inaugurated, bringing together innovators, startups, industry leaders and public institutions under one roof. The day will frame national priorities, spark collaborations, and shape the strategic AI discourse for the days ahead.

events.title: Multilingual AI in Universities - Advancing Inclusion Through UA and Stakeholder Insights
From Vision to Action: Scaling Equitable AI Advisory Systems Through AGX AI
The Future of Employability in the Age of AI
Inside India's Frontier Lab and Its Global South Impact
Harnessing AI to Transform India's Judicial Ecosystem

description: High-level panel discussions will continue, deepening sectoral dialogues across priority domains. The day will feature the launch of flagship Knowledge Compendiums — including the Casebooks on AI in Health, Energy, Education, Agriculture, Gender Empowerment and Disabilities — alongside a focused Seminar on Applied AI.

events.title: Tata AI Sakhi Immersion Program
AI for Social Good: Impact that Works
AI for Societal Value: Responsible Innovation Across Healthcare and High-Impact Sectors
From Research to Reality: Building Safe and Localized Health-AI Solutions for India
AI and India's Economic Growth: Sectoral Impact and the Road Ahead

description: The day bridges research and practice. The Research Symposium convenes leading academics, researchers and think tanks to showcase cutting-edge AI research, emerging methodologies and evidence-based policy insights. Dedicated Industry Sessions bring together global technology leaders, startups and sector champions to present scalable solutions, real-world deployments and future-ready innovations.

events.title: Building Sovereign AI Infrastructure: Empowering Citizens, Transforming Nations
Building Sovereign AI Infrastructure: Empowering Citizens, Transforming Nations
Building Safe and Trusted AI Infrastructure for Population-Scale AI
AI and Robotics: The Engine of India's New Industrial Age
Operating Models for AI Quality Across Billion-User Markets

description: The Formal Opening Ceremony is led by the Hon’ble Prime Minister of India. A high-level CEO Roundtable convenes global industry leaders, investors and policymakers to deliberate on strategic priorities, investment pathways and the future of responsible AI. The Leaders’ Plenary brings together national and international decision-makers to shape collective commitments, strengthen global partnerships and define India’s leadership in the AI decade ahead.

events.title: Inaugural Session
Keynote Session: Mukesh Dhirubhai Ambani, Chairman and Managing Director, Reliance
Fireside Chat
Keynote Session: Vishal Sikka, Chief Executive Officer, Vianai
Keynote Session: Bill Gates, Chair, Gates Foundation

description: High-level GPAI Council Meetings convene member countries to review progress, align priorities and strengthen multilateral cooperation on responsible and inclusive AI. The Leaders’ Declaration is adopted, affirming collective commitments and outlining a shared roadmap for global AI governance and collaboration.

events.title: Keynote Session : Sundar Pichai
AI for Economic Development and Social Good
Democratizing AI Compute and Digital Data Infrastructures
Building AI Readiness: From Compute to Capability
India's Path to an AGI-Enabling Ecosystem
